Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly a throwback to the 80's, has some funny moments, some bad comments, some cheap and cool action and lots of nudity and violence, and is a perfect example of B-Movies. If you want a low-budget action-comed love story you can't go
